name: bingo
description: An app to let you make custom bingo cards

scripts.browser-sync: npm run browser-sync start --files "bingo/static/**/*.css, bingo/static/**/*.js, bingo/**/*.py, bingo/**/*.html" --proxy 127.0.0.1:8000 --reload-delay=300 --reload-debounce=500
scripts.start: npm run concurrently --kill-others "npm run css-watch" "python bingo/manage.py runserver" "npm run browser-sync"

author: Jay Welborn
